cause.description:
Luekemia and Lymphoma are two diseases that can tear a family apart. I just want to raise awareness for this cause and maybe a little money to aid in the research of a cure. These families gothrough a lot on the day to day and maybe with our support they can live just a little bit easier knowing that someone cares. God Bless You All!
1. Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma
2. improve the quality of life of patients and their families
cause.mission: Raise awareness and help fund research
cause.name: Support Luekemia and Lymphoma Research
